scenes.text: Describe your product. Get a video. Subconscious turns your idea into a polished, multi-scene promotional video — with animations, themes, and AI voiceover — in under two minutes.
Your dashboard is your command center. See all your video projects at a glance, track their status, and spin up a new one with a single click.
The editor gives you total control. A live video preview updates in real time as our AI agent builds your scenes. Manage media, reorder your timeline, and chat with the agent — all in one place.
Just tell the agent what you want. Type a message — and watch it create custom scenes, apply your branding, and generate voiceover scripts on the fly.
Choose from five stunning visual themes. Each one sets a complete design system — colors, fonts, animations, and personality — so your video looks professional from the start.
Add a professional voiceover in seconds. The AI writes your script, you pick a voice, and ElevenLabs generates broadcast-quality narration for every scene.
Five curated themes. Over twenty-five scene types. From idea to finished video in under two minutes. Built for speed, designed for quality.
Ready to create your video? It takes less than a minute to get started. Try Subconscious — free.
